entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
